name: aws-sentry-ts-layer
description: Working example of using lambda layers to share common code between lambda functions.

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm install && npm run build:axios && npm run compile && npm run build:common
scripts.build:axios: npm install --prefix src/layers/AxiosLayer --no-package-lock --no-save && mkdir -p dist/axios-layer/nodejs/ && mv src/layers/AxiosLayer/node_modules/ dist/axios-layer/nodejs
scripts.deploy: npm run build && sam deploy --no-confirm-changeset --no-fail-on-empty-changeset --profile aws-sam-ts-test-user --config-env dev --resolve-s3

author: Domen Gabrovsek
